articles.title: Save Women's Sport group falls foul of NZ Cricket, NZ Football over image use - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Sports bodies request Save Women's Sport Australasia remove images featuring NZ women's teams from a website that promotes transgender exclusion in women's sport
articles.content:
Save Womens Sport Australasia has fallen foul of New Zealand Cricket and New Zealand Football, for using images of their athletes to promote transgender exclusion in womens sport.
